verses.verse: Now these are the heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH3187>, and this is the genealogy of them that went up <WH5927> with me from Babylon <WH894>, in the reign <WH4438> of Artaxerxes <WH783> the king <WH4438>:
Of the sons <WH1121> of Phinehas <WH6372>, Gershom <WH1647>. Of the sons <WH1121> of Ithamar <WH385>, Daniel <WH1840>. Of the sons <WH1121> of David <WH1732>, Hattush <WH2407>.

Of the sons <WH1121> of Shecaniah <WH7935>, of the sons <WH1121> of Parosh <WH6551>, Zechariah <WH2148>; and with him were reckoned by genealogy <WH3187> of the males <WH2145> a hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Pahath-moab <WH6355>, Eliehoenai <WH454> the son <WH1121> of Zerahiah <WH2228>; and with him two hundred <WH3967> males <WH2145>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Shecaniah <WH7935>, the son <WH1121> of Jahaziel <WH3166>; and with him three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Adin <WH5720>, Ebed <WH5651> the son <WH1121> of Jonathan <WH3129>; and with him fifty <WH2572> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Elam <WH5867>, Jeshaiah <WH3470> the son <WH1121> of Athaliah <WH6271>; and with him seventy <WH7657> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Shephatiah <WH8203>, Zebadiah <WH2069> the son <WH1121> of Michael <WH4317>; and with him fourscore <WH8084> males <WH2145>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Joab <WH3097>, Obadiah <WH5662> the son <WH1121> of Jehiel <WH3171>; and with him two hundred <WH3967> and eighteen <WH8083> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Shelomith <WH8019>, the son <WH1121> of Josiphiah <WH3131>; and with him a hundred <WH3967> and threescore <WH8346> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Bebai <WH893>, Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Bebai <WH893>; and with him twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Azgad <WH5803>, Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Hakkatan <WH6997>; and with him a hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> males <WH2145>.

And of the sons <WH1121> of Adonikam <WH140>, that were the last <WH314>; and these are their names <WH8034>: Eliphelet <WH467>, Jeuel <WH3273>, and Shemaiah <WH8098>; and with them threescore <WH8346> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Bigvai <WH902>, Uthai <WH5793> and Zabbud <WH2072>; and with them seventy <WH7657> males <WH2145>.

And I gathered them together <WH6908> to the river <WH5104> that runneth <WH935> to Ahava <WH163>; and there we encamped <WH2583> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>: and I viewed <WH995> the people <WH5971>, and the priests <WH3548>, and found <WH4672> there none of the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>.

Then sent <WH7971> I for Eliezer <WH461>, for Ariel <WH740>, for Shemaiah <WH8098>, and for Elnathan <WH494>, and for Jarib <WH3402>, and for Elnathan <WH494>, and for Nathan <WH5416>, and for Zechariah <WH2148>, and for Meshullam <WH4918>, chief men <WH7218>; also for Joiarib <WH3114>, and for Elnathan <WH494>, who were teachers <WH995>.

And I sent <WH6680> them forth <WH3318> unto Iddo <WH112> the chief <WH7218> at the place <WH4725> Casiphia <WH3703>; and I told <WH7760> them what <WH1697> they should say <WH1696> unto Iddo <WH112>, and his brethren <WH251> the Nethinim <WH5411>, at the place <WH4725> Casiphia <WH3703>, that they should bring <WH935> unto us ministers <WH8334> for the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>.

And according to the good <WH2896> hand <WH3027> of our God <WH430> upon us they brought <WH935> us a man <WH376> of discretion <WH7922>, of the sons <WH1121> of Mahli <WH4249>, the son <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, the son <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and Sherebiah <WH8274>, with his sons <WH1121> and his brethren <WH251>, eighteen <WH8083>;
and Hashabiah <WH2811>, and with him Jeshaiah <WH3470> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, his brethren <WH251> and their sons <WH1121>, twenty <WH6242>;

and of the Nethinim <WH5411>, whom David <WH1732> and the princes <WH8269> had given <WH5414> for the service <WH5656> of the Levites <WH3881>, two hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> Nethinim <WH5411>: all of them were mentioned <WH5344> by name <WH8034>.

Then I proclaimed <WH7121> a fast <WH6685> there <WH5104>, at the river Ahava <WH163>, that we might humble <WH6031> ourselves before <WH6440> our God <WH430>, to seek <WH1245> of him a straight <WH3477> way <WH1870> for us <WH2945>, and for our little ones, and for all our substance <WH7399>.

For I was ashamed <WH954> to ask <WH7592> of the king <WH4428> a band of soldiers <WH2428> and horsemen <WH6571> to help <WH5826> us against the enemy <WH341> in the way <WH1870>, because we had spoken <WH559> unto the king <WH4428>, saying <WH559>, The hand <WH3027> of our God <WH430> is upon all them that seek <WH1245> him <WH2896>, for good; but his power <WH5797> and his wrath <WH639> is against all them that forsake him <WH5800>.
So we fasted <WH6684> and besought <WH1245> our God <WH430> for this <WH6279>: and he was entreated of us.
Then I set apart <WH914> twelve <WH8147> of the chiefs <WH8269> of the priests <WH3548>, even Sherebiah <WH8274>, Hashabiah <WH2811>, and ten <WH6235> of their brethren with them <WH251>,

and weighed <WH8254> unto them the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627>, even the offering <WH8641> for the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>, which the king <WH4428>, and his counsellors <WH3289>, and his princes <WH8269>, and all Israel <WH3478> there present <WH4672>, had offered <WH7311>:

I weighed <WH8254> into their hand <WH3027> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> talents <WH3603> of silver <WH3701>, and silver <WH3701> vessels <WH3627> a hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603>; of gold <WH2091> a hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603>;

and twenty <WH6242> bowls <WH3713> of gold <WH2091>, of a thousand <WH505> darics <WH150>; and two <WH8147> vessels <WH3627> of fine <WH2896> bright brass <WH5178>, precious <WH2532> as gold <WH2091>.

And I said <WH559> unto them <WH6944>, Ye are holy unto Jehovah <WH3068>, and the vessels <WH3627> are holy <WH6944>; and the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091> are a freewill-offering <WH5071> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1>.

Watch <WH8245> ye <WH8104>, and keep them <WH8254>, until ye weigh them before <WH6440> the chiefs <WH8269> of the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881>, and the princes <WH8269> of the fathers <WH1>' houses of Israel <WH3478>, at Jerusalem <WH3389>, in the chambers <WH3957> of the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

So the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> received <WH6901> the weight <WH4948> of the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627>, to bring <WH935> them to Jerusalem <WH3389> unto the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>.

Then we departed <WH5265> from the river <WH5104> Ahava <WH163> on the twelfth <WH8147> day of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, to go <WH3212> unto Jerusalem <WH3389>: and the hand <WH3027> of our God <WH430> was upon us <WH5337>, and he delivered us from the hand <WH3709> of the enemy <WH341> and the lier-in <WH693>-wait by the way <WH1870>.
And we came <WH935> to Jerusalem <WH3389>, and abode <WH3427> there three <WH7969> days <WH3117>.

And on the fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117> the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091> and the vessels <WH3627> were weighed <WH8254> in the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430> into the hand <WH3027> of Meremoth <WH4822> the son <WH1121> of Uriah <WH223> the priest <WH3548>; and with him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Phinehas <WH6372>; and with them was Jozabad <WH3107> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3442>, and Noadiah <WH5129> the son <WH1121> of Binnui <WH1131>, the Levite <WH3881>;
the whole by number <WH4557> and by weight <WH4948>: and all the weight <WH4948> was written <WH3789> at that time <WH6256>.

The children <WH1121> of the captivity <WH1473>, that were come out <WH935> of exile <WH7628>, offered <WH7126> burnt-offerings <WH5930> unto the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, twelve <WH8147> bullocks <WH6499> for all Israel <WH3478>, ninety <WH8673> and six <WH8337> rams <WH352>, seventy <WH7657> and seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532>, twelve <WH8147> he-goats <WH6842> for a sin-offering <WH2403>: all this was a burnt-offering <WH5930> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And they delivered <WH5414> the king <WH4428>'s commissions <WH1881> unto the king <WH4428>'s satraps <WH323>, and to the governors <WH6346> beyond <WH5676> the River <WH5104>: and they furthered <WH5375> the people <WH5971> and the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.
